FuncDef: The reset ppp-user urpf discard statistics command clears the number of URPF-dropped PPPoE user packets.
CLIs: reset ppp-user urpf discard statistics [ ipv4 | ipv6 ] [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Number of IPv4 URPF-dropped packets to be cleared.
-

Number of IPv6 URPF-dropped packets to be cleared.
-

Indicates the slot number of the interface board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you want to reset the number of URPF-dropped PPPoE-type user packets, run the reset ppp-user urpf discard statistics to clear the original statistics.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
